rooms.description: Minimalist entrance hall with natural lighting and ventilation from the north-facing entrance. Incorporates a foyer space with simple modern design.
Open living area integrated with dining space, featuring large windows and sliding glass doors to enhance natural light.
Compact yet functional kitchen, designed for efficiency and natural ventilation. Adheres to minimalist design with integrated storage and modern appliances.
Master bedroom on the ground floor featuring a spacious balcony for relaxation, abundant natural light from windows facing south and west.
Additional bedroom with minimalistic design and integrated balcony space ensuring privacy, natural lighting, and ventilation.
